description: This file defines a Python class MistralEmbedder that integrates with the Mistral API to generate embeddings. It includes methods for creating a client, requesting embeddings, and handling responses, with configuration options and error handling.

classes.name: MistralEmbedder
classes.description: A class that wraps the Mistral API for embedding generation, extending the base Embedder class with additional configuration and response handling.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns the Mistral client, creating it if necessary with provided parameters.

methods.name: _response
methods.description: Internal method that sends a request to the Mistral API to get an embedding response for the given text.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Public method that retrieves the embedding vector for the provided text.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Public method that retrieves both the embedding vector and usage information for the provided text.
